description: Describes Video Flow constraints specific to H.264 defined in the NMOS Parameter Registers.
title: Video Flow resource

level.description: Level. Indicates constraints on parameters of the coding tools that are in use, as defined for the Flow media type.

profile.description: Profile. Indicates the subset of coding tools that are in use, as defined for the Flow media type.

urn:x-matrox:constant_bit_rate.description: Constant bit rate. Indicates that the Flow is constant or variable bit rate.
